fullplot: A pair of children, born within moments of India gaining independence from Britain, grow up in the country that is nothing like their parent's generation.
plot: A pair of children, born within moments of India gaining independence from Britain, grow up in the country that is nothing like their parent's generation.
title: Midnight's Children

tomatoes.consensus: Though Midnight's Children is beautiful to look at and poignant in spots, its script is too indulgent and Deepa Mehta's direction, though ambitious, fails to bring the story together cohesively.

writers: Salman Rushdie (based on a book by)
